keyword.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a word that you type into a computer so that it will search for that word on the Internet
keyword.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: You can find the site by entering the keyword ‘Quark’.
keyword.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a word that you type into a computer so that it will search for that word in a set of documents or on the Internet
keyword.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: You can search for articles containing a particular keyword.
